detail_desc: Fitted top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a deep, lace-trimmed V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and a wide seam centre front to create a draped effect. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Set with a bodysuit and pair of leggings in printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Leather boots with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings, leather insoles and chunky soles.
Short, glittery skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trainers in imitation suede with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Jacket in soft thermal fleece with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and covered heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Small metal hoop earrings with pendants in various designs. Length approx. 2.8 cm.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Sandals with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles with a braided jute trim. Heel approx. 7 cm.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with frill-trimmed shoulder straps.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in sturdy, rib-knit organic cotton. Jumper with raglan sleeves, buttons on the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with a drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless top in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a deep V-neck and gathered yoke at the front. Seam at the waist with smocking at the back, and a flounce at the hem.
Nightshirt in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the front, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening. Sewn-in belt, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in jersey made from a soft cotton blend. Top with a V-neck and button placket. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Decorative scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Sandals with narrow leather straps, leather insoles and fluted rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and gathers at the top. Loose fit with a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Short top in airy, ribbed jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and a twisted detail at the hem.
Ankle boots with block heels and a visible zip in one side. Fluted soles. Heel approx. 7 cm.

Studio Collection. Super-wide culottes woven in a wool blend with a discreet shimmer. Regular waist with an extended waistband, hook-and-eye fastening and safety button on the inside. Zip fly, jetted back pockets with a button and knee-length legs with creases. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Trainers with lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined bikini. Top with wide shoulder straps and a racer back with a cut-out section and wide elastic hem. Bottoms with a wide elastic waistband.
Straight-cut blouse in satin crêpe with a boat neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with metal buttons.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, patch front pockets, padded shoulders and a pleat at the back. Lined.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed denim with sparkly stones at the front, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
V-neck tunic in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, flap chest pockets and a double-layer yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked waist with decorative bows at the sides. Jersey lining.
A pair of twisted metal hoop earrings with pendants decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 4.5 cm.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides.
A set of three fabric-covered Alice bands including one with glitter and one with a bow.

Rectangular waist bag in wide-wale cotton corduroy and imitation leather. Zip at the top, an adjustable waist strap, one outer compartment and one inner compartment, both with a zip. Lined. Size 4x15x27 cm.
Body in soft mesh and microfibre with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps that twist at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with appliqués, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Straight-cut satin dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a sewn-on bow and slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, a decorative tie detail at the front, spaghetti shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps.
Dress in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and buttons at the back of the neck.
Soft slippers in shimmering metallic imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with a hook and loop fastening. Fabric linings and insoles and soft imitation leather soles.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with flounced sleeves in woven fabric with embroidery and scalloped edges.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Lace thong briefs with a lined gusset and string back.
Suede slides with a bow at the front, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Rugby shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a woven collar, button placket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides.

Fully-fashioned, glittery hi-top trainers with a ribbed trim at the ankles and a grosgrain loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles made from partly recycled polyester. Sturdy, patterned rubber soles.
Sleeveless dress in shimmering, patterned tulle with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and hem with tiers to create width in the skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, jersey-lined wrapover hood, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dressy leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from wool with a high, elasticated waist and legs with sewn-in creases, and slits at the hems.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in imitation suede with decorative metal details on the front of the waistband, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation leather with a zip and buttons at the back.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in soft viscose jersey.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and slim legs with creases.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with a slightly lower neckline and long sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front, decorative knot detail at the bust and ties that fasten at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved jumpsuit in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Deep V-neck, wrapover at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Dress in spot-print viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front, 3/4-length sleeves with gathered, elasticated seams and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Joggers in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.Side pockets, a zipped back pocket and tapered legs with elastication and a zip at the hems.
